text: Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim deraghvɨra duar kamɨn ganigh fogh suam, an duar kurimɨn aven itir arɨziba ghurghurigha gɨfa, ezɨ duam bar an mɨkarzimɨn aven ghu, kar lepan arɨmariamra o arɨmariar ekiar igharazim. Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumazim an ganigh gɨvagh, kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, ‘Gumazir kam, a Godɨn damazimɨn zuezir puvatɨ.’
